price: Humo wataegemea juu ya viti vya enzi, hawataona humo jua kali wala baridi kali.
arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
footnotes: Wakiegemea huko Peponi juu ya makochi, hawaoni joto la jua, wala shida ya baridi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran
